name: places/ChIJ0cf5yapZwokR2IADUHDjypI
formattedAddress: 110 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 110 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Jewelry chain featuring a variety of necklaces, rings, customizable charm bracelets & more.

originalText.text: So yesterday I went to this Pandora store to buy gifts for my mom and wife , and  the ladies 5 or 6  that work there are not polite they don't iven look at you when you enter to the store, I was watching the jewelry and no body ask me if I need anything except one woman who I suppose to be the manager and she call a worker to help me to decide. i bought one engraved lock and a pendant. By the way, the store is nice :)

By the way, the store is nice :)

originalText.text:
DO NOT VISIT THIS PANDORA STORE, GO TO OTHER PANDORA. TERRIBLE SERVICE AND ATTITUDE
We always buy charms everywhere we go to kinda collect the memories, this time is the worst feeling we’ve ever had at Pandora from all the branches we’ve visited around the world. We got in the store and found something we like so we waited patiently for 30 minutes during the wait time, there were no associates were looking at us, welcoming or telling us anything. We humbly asked if one of associates who seems to be available if she can assist us later on. The answer we got was sorry I can’t help you, no explanation. There were several customers who came after us and got taken care of before us, we were confused of the queuing system inside the store, so we went to the second associate to ask if we can see the charm closely. The answer we got was a question, “is she(the associate in the beginning)not taking care of you?” We said nope and the first associate also said no. But this second associate (yellow circle) just said okay and mind her own business not explaining, not saying what should we do. Then we waited for another 10 minutes just to see if any of the 4 associates include the manager are gonna take us or not. So finally the first associate came to assist us with no smile on her face at all. Not saying hi, not explain. She was just stand there and waited for us to speak.
We ended up leaving empty handed because we could go to another Pandora store and get treated better as a customer or at least a person who’s likely to have conversation with you. Our experience at this branch is unacceptable and terrible. We never had this kind of treatment before and wouldn’t have thought it would come from Pandora, it will make Pandora look bad. The picture is just give you the idea on how can we got ignored even though we stood in front of the associates like that.

originalText.text: I understand that Pandora is a popular store and that I visited during a busy time, but I waited to be helped for nearly a hour. Most of that time was spent waiting outside in the cold. They wouldn’t have gotten my business if it weren’t for me needing one of my sought after travel charms. Overall, pandora can do better than this.

text.text: I understand that Pandora is a popular store and that I visited during a busy time, but I waited to be helped for nearly a hour. Most of that time was spent waiting outside in the cold. They wouldn’t have gotten my business if it weren’t for me needing one of my sought after travel charms. Overall, pandora can do better than this.

originalText.text: My experience at this Pandora was literally perfect and I owe it all to Sabrina. From the moment I walked into the store she acknowledged me and made sure I got exactly what I wanted, made recommendations, and taught me some things about jewelry care. I spent approx 45mins to an hr with her as she cleaned my jewelry and helped me build a new one. She was so patient, knowledgeable, and a true sweetheart! A real gem to this location! I had came here the previous day and left cus no one paid me any attention in the store so I was extremely happy to have someone like her assist me this time. Also, the store was very clean, neat, and orderly and in a perfect location. If I lived here in NYC, this would be the store I’d return to :)

originalText.text: The store like every other Pandora store is beautiful, but the staff is AWFUL!  We did one of the personalized jewels with the iPad and none of them was helpful or cute and gentle in our regards. If a couple comes to your store to manifest their love buying something from you, it would be nice if you kinda “share” the love spirit with us, but instead they just can’t wait for you to pay them and leave the store leaving them alone. Poor poor service, please Pandora choose the staff more accurately because there’s a lot of good workers out there that wants to be gentle with their costumers.
